item.title: docker私有仓库pull和push

item.description: login 1 docker login <host> pull 1 docker pull <host>/<porject>/<repo>:<tag> push 重新打 tag 1 docker tag <img_name>:<tage> <host>/<project>/<repo>:<tag> push 1 docker push <host>/<porject>/<repo>:<tag>
